choices: Emily Hughes, figure skating,  United States
Sasha Cohen, figure skating, United States
1.content: Which female Olympian would you like to see grow to Olympic proportions?
1.title: The Road to Torino

11.content: "I'm bloody tired," said bubbly blonde aerials skiing champion Alisa Camplin. She had been training her heart out all week trying to get into form for the Torino Olympic Games. Just weeks earlier, she had to have surgery on her badly damaged knee and have tissue from a cadaver implated into the knee. Doctors and Australian team officals were keeping a close eye on her to see if she reinjures the knee or if something else goes wrong. What the doctors and officials didn't know was that the cadaver that had been used for the surgery was buried near a nuclear facility and some nuclear material had been dumped in the cemetary where the body was buried.
11.title: Reach Higher

choices: An Electric Feeling in the Air
12.content:
Just named Italian team captain and flagbearer, 19 year old skater Carolina Kostner was on cloud nine. At 5'6 with long legs that makes males, even those who hate figure skating, weak in the knees. Her smile never wore off, like that's a bad thing.
A week before the Games, she moves into the athletes' village and settles in. "Penso che stia andando come ad esso qui. Hey questo è giochi della sede dopo tutti.-I think I'm going to like it here. Hey this is a home Games after all."
After meeting with officials about protocal and handling the flag, she makes her way to a fancy restaraunt for a good meal with her family.
"Così come siete preparazioni Carolina andante? Migliorate non la goccia che li inbandiera ora si sente, o state andando essere piatti da pulizia per un mese!-So how are you preparations going Carolina? You better not drop that flag now you hear, or you're gonna be cleaning dishes for a month!", remarked her grandfather.
"Non sono realmente che quello nervoso e tutto, infatti, Mi ho così tanto andare per ora che ritengo come io conquesr qualche cosa della latta, anche se essere arrogante non è in mia natura.-I'm not actually that nervous one and all, in fact, I have so much going for me right now I feel like I can conquesr anything, although being arrogant is not in my nature.", Carolina told her family.
12.title: Anticipation

121.content:
2 hours after they had gathered, the Kostner family had finished up and made their separate ways. Carolina took her passion red Fiat, a gift from one of her sponsors for winning a bronze medal at the World Championships a year ago, and drove away from the cafe feeling quite content, both with the meal and with her preparations.
Cranking her car's stereo up as loud as possible, she tuned into her favouite music, which she uses to get her fired up.
As she approaches the athletes' village, she notices a power plant that was all decked out for the Olympics.
"Quello è abbastanza bizzarro, provare a rendere qualcosa provare così ugly a osservare così attraente. Kinda stupido, ma stupido quanto il mio padre maledetto che prova a colpire sul waitress!-That's pretty weird, trying to make something so ugly trying to look so attractive. Kinda stupid, but not as stupid as my damn father trying to hit on the waitress!", Carolina says to herself, but as she laughs, she doesn't see that her car is just about to ram into a tanker truck filled with radioactive material.
121.title: The Accident

1211.content:
Seeing herself about to hit a radioactive waste tanker, Carolina slams on the brakes as hard as she can. "SCCCRRRRRREEEEEEETTTTTCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHH!!!!!", her car struggles, but ultimately fails to stop in time, and a huge crash ensues. Just as things could not get any worse for Carolina, the waste explodes all over her, and her body is entirely covered in radioactive waste.
"Crap dell'OH! Che cosa l'inferno ha accaduto appena? Uomo dell'OH, ciò realmente sta andando rimettere le mie preparazioni, e quello è il senso piacevole di dirlo.-Oh crap! What the hell just happened? Oh man, this is really going to put my preparations back, and that's the nice way of saying it." The driver of the truck in front of her has just realized that someone has crashed into his truck and goes to see if that person is all right, not knowing that that person is Italy's best figure skater.
"Siete tutto il di destra là? Spiacente circa il traf lento...opinione, non siete la Carolina Kostner, la figura skater? Se siete, lo desiderate prenderlo all'ospedale?-Are you all right there? Sorry about the slow traf...say, aren't you Carolina Kostner, the figure skater? If you are, do you want me to take you to the hospital?", the driver inquired.
Replied Carolina, "Sì sono, signore. E nessun non dovete prenderli all'ospedale, Sono GIUSTO. Sono preoccupato per questi effluenti radioattivi comunque.-Yes I am, sir. And no you don't have to take me to the hospital, I'm OK. I'm worried about this radioactive waste though."
"Bene, approvazione allora. Manterrei un occhio fuori su tutti i sintomi che potreste sperimentare, tutto il a destra. Sono solo felice voi sono tutti di destra, e progetto sull'incoraggiarli sopra ad oro olimpico. Buona fortuna Carolina, So che tirerò per voi.-Well, ok then. I'd keep an eye out on any symptoms you might experience, all right. I'm just glad you're all right, and I plan on cheering you on to Olympic gold. Good luck Carolina, I know I'll be pulling for you."
After the driver and Carolina made their departure from the scene, experts arrived to check out the carnage and the leftover mess.
After initial tests, they discovered that the waste had been used to enlarge various plants and animals in tests. A growth serum it was. That's when it hit the experts: Carolina had been drenched with a growth serum, meaning she was about undergo the mother of all growth spurts.
1211.title: Changes

12111.content:
It is now Friday morning in Torino, and in a matter of hours, Carolina Kostner would be leading the host nation into Stadio Olimpico during the Opening Ceremony. She will join a very exclusive club of people who have earned the right to bear their nation's flag into the Opening, doing so as the host nation. It will be tremendous honour that will never be forgotten, but so to will what will take place this day.
Carolina Kostner finally wakes up after a good night's sleep, and she needed it after nearly killing herself in a wreck with a radioactive waste tanker.
The first thing she does is go to the mirror to beautify herself. You gotta look extra special when you're carrying your nation's flag into the Olympics, even more so as the home team.
As she gets her clothing together to get geared up, she notices something peculiar.
"Al right, rivestimento, pantaloni, bandierina. Controllo. Per non provarli su...attenda un minuto. Potrei giurare questa misura me. Non lo ho portato mai yeat, Non lo ho lavato mai, ma non misura me. Darò gli altri...l'OH grande! I miei pattini, ed i pantaloni non misura me neanche. Qualcuno deve ristringerlo nella lavata! Non li ho lavati, qualcuno deve avere, e sto andando scoprire chi!-Al right, jacket, pants, flag. Check. Not to try them on...wait a minute. I could have sworn this fit me. I've never worn it yeat, I've never washed it, and yet it doesn't fit me. I'll give the others...oh great! My shoes, and pants don't fit me either. Someone must have shrunk them in the wash! I didn't wash them, someone must have, and I'm going to find out who did!", Carolina exclaimed as she stormed off, wearing her Italian team pajamas that had been issued only to the women of the team, which now feels much more uncomfortable than when she put them on. Whether it was anger in the moment, but as she'll eventually realize, there's more to this than meets the eye.
12111.title: A Dramatic Increase

choices: The Big Night Gets Even Bigger
121111.content:
The coach of Italy's figure sating team has arrived on the floor of the main building where the Italian athletes are staying for the duration of the Games, when he encounters a steaming mad Carolina Kostner.
"Vettura, Non sono felice. Ho messo sopra la mia uniforme di cerimonia dopo che mi fossi alzato, e non misura me. Ho mai uniforme portato loro fino all'oggi, e mai persino li avevo lavati. o c'è ne dei miei compagni di squadra?-Coach, I'm not happy. I put on my ceremony uniform after I had gotten up, and they don't fit me. I've never even worn them until today, and I had never even washed them. Did you or did any of my teammates?", she demanded.
Replied the coach,"Sono stato intorno ai vostri compagni di squadra tutto questo volta, e posso confermarlo mai non ho toccato i vostri vestiti. E dite che i vostri vestiti hanno ristretto. Ho un'idea, La Carolina. Levisi in piedi in su contro la parete, così posso misurare la vostra altezza e vedere se ci sono delle anomalie.-I've been around your teammates all this time, and I can confirm they have never touched your clothes. And you say your clothes have shrunk. I have an idea, Carolina. Stand up against the wall, so I can measure your height and see if there are any abnormalities." So she agreed and brought in the medical staff to see if there was anything wrong. Her last measured height was 5'6, but here, she was measured at 5'8 and a half.
"La Carolina Buona, potete distendersi. I vostri vestiti non hanno ristretto, vi siete sviluppati. Avete aumentato vertiginosamente 2 ed i pollici di metà.-Well Carolina, you can relax. Your clothing hasn't shrunk, you've grown. You've shot up 2 and a half inches.", the coach told a disconcerted Carolina.
She replies, "Dovete scherzarli. Sto ottenendo più alto? Quello è impossibile, Sono 19, una ragazza come me dovrebbe arrestare crescere bene prima di ora. Indovino il questo che cosa accade quando vi arrestate...-You have got to be kidding me. I'm getting taller? That's impossible, I'm 19, a girl like me should have stopped growing well before now. I guess this what happens when you crash...", Carolina replies nonchalantly before the coach intervenes. "Che arresto?-What crash?"
"Niente. Dovrei essere felice per stasera, condurre la nostra squadra in Stadio Olimpico per la cerimonia come capitano della squadra, ma mi confondo circa crescere la vigilia dei giochi. Non potete trovare qualcun'altro?-Nothing. I should be happy for tonight, leading our team into Stadio Olimpico for the ceremony as team captain, and yet I'm embarrassed about having grown on the eve of the Games. Can't you find someone else?"
The coach tells her, "La Carolina, la parte di essere il flagbearer significa responsibilty. Siete una donna giovane, dovreste conoscere la responsabilità ormai. Avete vinto le medaglie sulle fasi più grandi nella la figura pattinare, qualcosa nessun altro italiano come fatto nelle decadi. Quella responsabilità degli introiti. Potete non ottenere mai ancora questa occasione. Approfittilo mentre potete. Ricordisi di, la folla non si preoccuperà quanto alto siete, si preoccuperanno per incoraggiare per il loro propri. Quando vedete tutto il colore rosso, bandierine bianche e verdi che sono fluttuate intorno allo stadio mentre chanting "Forza", quella è qualcosa che non possiate mettere un prezzo sopra. Lo capite?-Carolina, part of being the flagbearer means responsibility. You're a young woman, you should know responsibility by now. You've won medals on the biggest stages in figure skating, something no other Italian has done in decades. That takes responsibility. You may never get this opportunity again. Take advantage of it while you can. Remember, the crowd won't care how tall you are, they'll care about cheering for their own. When you see all the red, white and green flags being waved around the stadium while chanting "Forza", that's something you can't put a price on. You understand me?"
"Sì. Ritengo molto più meglio circa me. Sto andando fare questo. Ma prima che, potreste trovare un nuovo formato in uniforme per me dovuto il mio formato aumentato?-Yes I do. I feel much better about myself. I'm going to do this. But before I do, could you find a new size in uniform for me due to my increased size?", Carolina requested of her coach. He agrees, and everything is settled.
121111.title: Worries

1211111.content:
Now having been outfitted in larger sized gear as a result of her growth spurt, Carolina joined her teammates at the staging area for the parade of nations. At the Palavela, the venue for short track speedskating and Carolina's event figure skating, 80 delegations had gathered in preparation for the walk over to Stadio Olimpico for the Opening Ceremony. You would think there would be a lot of nervouse people there as for 90 percent of the athletes, this was their shining moment, but it was a light hearted atmosphere with many a practical joke being played. Case in point, at the U.S. area, one of their athletes laid a whooppee cushion on the chair of one of their leaders. As soon as he sat down, the whole area burst into laughter. Even Carolina's teammates got into the act. Silvia Fontana, one of Carolina's figure skating teammates and closest friends, dared Enrico, a speed skater, to drink a whole gallon of cold milk. Needless to say it ended up all over the place, not to mention with lots of laughter and one pretty sick skater.
As the big moment began to draw ever closer, Carolina made a stop at one of the restrooms in the concourse, away from all the noise, to get herself fired up for the honour of carrying Italy's iconic green, white and red flag before not only a stadium of 35,000, but also a worldwide audience of two billion people. As she put on a tiny bit of makeup, she noticed that her new shoes were feeling tighter than when she got them, ditto for her clothing under her silver fur trimmed coat. She thought to herself, "L'OH mi non dice. Uno è nervosismo, o sto sviluppandosi ancora. Lo prego sono il posteriore, poichè non posso permettersi di passare attraverso un altro cambiamento del wardrobe a causa di altezza aumentata. E spero seriamente che nessuno abbia preso la mia acqua.-Oh don't tell me. Either it's nervousness, or I'm growing again. I hope it's only nervousness, as I can't afford to go through another wardrobe change because of increased height. And I seriously hope noone took my water."
Little did she realize, she had now shot up to 6 foot on the dot, and was still gradually growing, however little by little.
1211111.title: The Big Night Gets Even Bigger

choices: the screams of fans and people.
12111112.content:
Just then A knock was at her Dressing rooms Door."Hello Anyone in there?"said a voice.It was an american boy. all of the sudden the boy heard Carolina screaming in pain.
"Ms.Carolina are you ok?"the boy asked. Then it happened. Carolina's clothing began ripping apart at the seams. Her shoes exploded off of her rapidly expanding feet, and her chest swelled up like a balloon, even sounding like a balloon being inflated, pushing her shirt and coat to the breaking point and finally well past it. Carolina panicked as her growing only accelerated,"L'OH il mio dio che sto sviluppandosi! Sto ottenendo più grande! Suppongo che è venuto a questo...- Oh my God I'm growing! I'm getting bigger! I suppose it has come to this..."
Meanwhile, the guy went to the main hall and shouted to everyone gathered, "Everyone get out now! Something's happening! I swear to you if you don't leave right now we're all going to pay dearly!"
They all laughed at him, but then they heard shaking, some fearing it could be an earthquake. But then a gigantic hand exploded through the south side of the Palavela. The Italian delegation realized right away it was Carolina, they knew it was her as she was the only one who painted the colours of the Italian flag on her hand, and finally every last person made a break for the outside to escape Carolina's rapldly expanding stature. And as soon as the 80 delegations as well as numerous volunteers reached a safe point near Stadio Olimpico, the roof of the buliding was destroyed and there was a 1600ft.Carolina Kostner standing in front of the folks at the Olympics, even bringing the Opening Ceremony in the stadium to a standstill.("CHE COSA È ACCADUTO ME? E WHO SIETE RAGAZZO "PICCOLO"?-WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO ME? AND WHO ARE YOU "LITTLE" BOY?")She said to the now tiny little Boy in front of her(sorry but i couldn't resist to put my friend Alex in it,He just loves the winter olympics.). She forgot about the Olympics utill she heard...
12111112.title: Centre of the Olympics

121111121.content:
She was waiting for an answer when suddenly everything got quiet. She looked over to see everyone staring at her. She had been in such a panic mode before, she hadn't noticed that only her bra and panties grew with her. She didn't know what to do, she didn't want to hurt anyone but she couldn't stay her either. She grabbed the boy and stood up to her full height, making sure she didn't hurt anyone.

("Please, tell me who you are") Carolina asked. However, it took her a second to realize the boy couldn't understand her. After a minute of thinking, she thought of a way to get him to understand. She put her index finger on the boy's chest. After a minute of confusion, the boy nodded. He put his hand on his chest.

"Alex." He said loud enough for her to hear. She smiled, Alex was a nice name. Suddenly, Carolina's stomach groaned loud enough for the city to hear. When the audience heard this, they suddenly got the impression that she was about to use them to fulfill her. Most of them screamed and ran away, making Carolina nervous. Alex, however, rubbed his belly and then pointed to the city. Carolina nodded and started to walk, carefully watching where she was stepping. Alex led her until they got to…
121111121.title: Body language expresses words

1211111212.content:
Carolina kept going until they got to a famous fast food restaurant. The giantess smiled and pulled the roof off without thinking. Everybody inside saw her and ran out screaming. Normally, this would worry her, however, she was too focused on the delicious food. Using her dominant hand, she reached down and grabbed what she could, tearing the building up. Alex watched in amazement as she gobbled everything up, he was certainly glad that he wasn't on the menu. Carolina made sure she got everything, then went on to the next building.

At the next building, she repeated the process, devouring everything that was edible. However, when Alex saw this, he suddenly realized she wasn't about to stop, and if she wasn't careful, she might grab someone and eat them without realizing it. He started to jump and yell to get her attention, however, she wasn't paying attention. It was only until the fourth location did she notice him. She tilted her head in confusion. When the boy tried to get her to stop, she simply smiled. It wasn't that she didn't understand, she just didn't care. Her stomach needed to be taken care of and this tiny human wasn't about to stop her. For a second, she thought about swallowing him, then she wouldn't have to pay attention to him. However, she decided against that idea. She then gained a safe and easy idea.

Using one finger, Carolina pushed Alex down on his back carefully. Then, before he could get up, she started to tickle his belly. The boy started to laugh, unable to control himself. His laughter was starting to make Carolina smile. She felt like a mother playing with her child. However, as they were having fun, the giantess felt something in her belly. Carolina stopped tickling and set Alex on her breast. This both embarrassed and confused him until he felt the same rumbling that she was feeling.

"Oh moi," Carolina said. Before she realized what was going on, she instinctively opened her mouth.

BURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP

The earthquake sized burp traveled through most of the city, breaking glass and setting off alarms. She covered her mouth instantly and blushed. Her burp had made a lot of people panic. She couldn't move forward because there was a lot of people running and yelling their heads off. She was about to say something to them when she gave a smaller burp.

("Excuse me!") she said to everyone, even though she knew they couldn't understand her. She suddenly remembered her friend and brought him up to her face. Alex blushed and smiled. She decided to…
1211111212.title: The hunger won't end

choices: She felt something strange inside her
A mother and child wanted to talk to say hello
Someone was there to escort her in
She went into the locker room to get prepared
A strange person was looking at her
14.content:
Emily had been training for weeks. She listened to her coach and had been practicing whenever she had time. She was going to make sure that she made her family and friends proud. Even if she didn't get a gold medal, she wasn't about to be defeated easily. On the day of the Olympics, she was a little nervous. However, she wasn't about to back down from a challenge. On the way though, a strange man wearing a mask bumped into her.

"Hey watch it." She said. As he turned towards her, a chill went down her spine. There was something unnatural about him.

"Good luck today, miss Hughes. I think you will find this day to be exciting." He said in a deep voice. He walked away, leaving Emily alone. She wasn't sure what he meant, but she couldn't worry about it right now. She continued on to her destination. When she got there…
14.title: Already a strange day

choices: Sasha goes back to her room
15.content:
"Ok, let's try it again," the coach told Sasha Cohen as she continued her program rehearsal at the skating venue in Torino, prepping for her big moment. At 21 and one Olympics under her belt, she feels this is her time. She's won most majoe events you could think of, yet this is why she's not satisfied: being an Olympic champion.
"Do you think I did OK out there," Sasha asked her coach. "You could stand some improvement but you are making considerable progress Sasha," her coach replied. "Now I don't know about you, but I'm hungry, are you?" "Yeah I guess I am, being out on the rink for 2 hours does make one long for pasta," said Sasha.
The two gather up their belongings and make their way out of the Torino Palavela and back for the Olympic Village. Little did the two know something big was going to happen.
15.title: Patience Is A Virtue

151.content:
As Sasha got to the Village cafe, it was jam packed with her fellow athletes also wanting a bite to eat. Some complained about the quality of food, but others are just happey with getting food after long hard practices.
Sasha gets in line and order a pasta salad, calimari (as a bit of a splurge), and a soda. Maybe not a lot, but after ner morning, sustinance is sustinance.
"Oh hey Sasha! How was practice?" asked her teammate Emily Hughes, who was accompanied by short track skater Alison Baver, and they too had finished their practices. "Not too bad, but not great either. I've still got aways to go if I want to be in good form," replied Sasha. After the sentence, she took a sip of the cola she'd bought from the line. Little did she realize it was tainted, not with steroids or any performance enhancing drug, but it had been irradiated in an test in a Torino factory, and someone forgot to take it off the manufacturing line before it got to the village.
As she finished up, she gathered her stuff and went out.
151.title: Feeding Frenzy

1511.content:
Walking out of the cafe, Sasha made a break for her room. It was quite spacious, almost double the size of a regular apartment. The room featured a mini bar, a 36" high definition tv, a PSP console given to all the athletes, and a great view of downtown Torino with its majestic Mole Antonelliana in the background. She wanted time to herself before going back to the Palavela for another practice run.
About 45 minuted later, however, she had an uneasy feeling in her stomach. "Oh no, not a stomachache, I hope I didn't eat or drink anything that made this," Sasha thought to herself, but then as quickly as it came, it went away. "OK, that was weird," said Sasha.
She gets her shoes to go out, but she struggles putting them on. "Wait a minute, I could have sworn these fit me today. There's no way any part of me could have enlarged. That's only something you see in science fiction movies. It can't possibly happen in real life," Sasha said, but unfortunately for her, she was about to learn, it CAN happen.
1511.title: A Problem with Logic

15111.content:
At the Palavela, other skaters had arrived to practice their routines to gear up for the competition at hand. Sasha knew she had a pretty formidable competition to deal with. There was perennial champion Irina Slutskaya of Russia, the favourite, Shizuka Aragawa of Japan, a sleeper contender for a medal. And then there was the home favourite, Carolina Kostner of Italy. She had won bronze at the European and World championships, raising expectations she might provide Torino its "Cathy Freeman" moment.
Sasha got to the Palavela to further tweak her program. She got to the dress room to change into her outfit, which is normally an easy task, but today, it's harder than usual.
"Coach, I can't fit into my outfit,"said Sasha towards her coach, who was standing at the guardrail in the rink itself watching other skaters practice.
"What? That can't be right. Did you have the dress washed recently?", the coach replied.
"No not really, not in the last couple of days, as I had worn other outfits."
"Go try on the others, Sasha, and see what happens."
So Sasha made her way back into the dressing room and changed again and again, and none of her skating outfits fit her, sending her into outright anger.
"I don't believe it! None of them fit!", Sasha yelled at her coach.
"Wait a minute, I have an idea. Sasha, would you mind standing up against the wall, I need to see something," the coach asked of Sasha. "Uh, OK."
Her coach brought out a tape measure, and discovered something startling: Sasha had grown taller.
"Um, Sasha, I found the reason why your outfits don't fit you anymore, and you aren't going to believe what I'm about to tell you. You gotten taller."
"WHAT??? No way. How on earth did that happen," Sasha replied with fear and trepedation.
"Actually Sasha, it's not all that uncommon for women your age to grow another couple of inches. I had a friend back in college, and despite being 21, she shot up 4 inches, true story.", the coach said as he tried to calm her down.
"Why don't you ask another skater if they would let you borrow one of their outfits?", the coach suggested to Sasha.
"All right, not a problem." Sasha made her wasy to the concourse, and bumped into Shizuku, who was stretching before heading onto the ice.
"Oh hi Shizuku, do you mind if I ask you for a favour?", Sasha asked her.
"OK," replied Shizuku, and the two made their way into the change room, and Shizuku gave her a sprakling maroon sequined dress, which Sasha had secretly liked for a while.
"Thanks, Shizuku. I'm so grateful for this." Sasha said, giving hre thanks to one of her chief rivals for gold.
15111.title: Wardrobe Malfunction

151111.content:
Sasha made her way onto the ice, but all of a sudden, had a bit of a stumble as soon as her skates hit the ice.
"OUCH!," Sasha yelped as she hit the ice rather hard.
She looked toward her skates to see if anything was wrong, and what she saw next was utter disbelief to her own two eyes.
Her skates made a rather odd stretching sound, and as soon as she heard it, her feet spilled out of the skates and the skates were torn to shreds. "Oh my God, what's happening to me?!" Sasha said in utter bewilderment. As she stood up, she felt a pressure in her chest that was not there before. As soon as she looked down, her breasts, which had been considered small by most women her age, ballooned exponentially outwards and pushed her borrowed outfit to the breaking point. A ring on one of her fingers, which she had gotten as a gift for winning a spot on the Olympic team, exploded off of her hand as she inched higher and higher.
The other skaters, clearly disturbed by the noise, were about to kindly tell Sasha to quiet down when they saw an unbelievale sight: a growing Sasha Cohen.
They panicked and clamoured for the exists while Sasha's clothing was ripping apart at the seams as her head made its way towards the ceiling and beyond. "Oh God oh God oh God oh God oh God oh God...," Sasha prayed to herself as her size continued to increase.
151111.title: Exceleration

1511111.content:
The skaters escaped from the Palavela just in time, as a thundering crash was heard just moments later. It was a sight not one of them will ever forget. Emerging from the crumbling Palavela was an evergrowing, not to mention stunned, Sasha Cohen, already at nearly 200 feet tall and still increasing.
Meanwhile, the international media had descended upon Torino to cover the XX Olympic Winter Games, or so they thought. As they did daily updates of the Games and the buildup to the big competitions, they recieved calls from unnamed sources to go to the Palavela as soon as possible as something big happened. Pardon the pun.
1511111.title: The Giant Figure Skater

15111111.content:
Once the media had arrived to check up on what was happening, at first glance, they knew right away what was happening. They looked up and saw a pair of legs go on and on, and saw the horrified face of one of the biggest starts going into these Games, actually getting even bigger despite already being 500 feet tall. Sasha thought to herself, "Oh my God! Why won't this stop? Now I won't be able to compete since I'm too big to fit anywhere!"
The crowd of onlookers watched in awe while constantly moving backwards as the giant female skating champion grew ever bigger. Many of Torino's most storied buildings were now under serious threat because of the growing goddess. IOC and Italian government officals finally arrived on the scene, and much like everyone else, watched in sheer horror as the now literally biggest female personality threatened to destroy the Olympic host city.
15111111.title: Taking Over Torino

151111111.content:
Back in the athletes' village, Sasha Cohen's US teammates were busy catching up with each other as well as meeting up with the Italian, Canadian, French, Chinese and Austrian teams. Goofing around was to be expected as most of the athletes are early to mid 20s, some fresh out of university. There was even one group of two Americans and two Italians doing Jackass stunts with each other.
As this was going on, the team leader of the U.S. was called by phone by a Torino city official. "Hello. This is the City of Torino, and we want to inform you that you must get to the Palavela arena right now. Something has happened to one of your athletes."
"What?", replied the U.S. team leader. Said the Torino city official in broken English, "Something big. If I were you, I'd be careful where you go."
So several members of the U.S., Italian and Canadian team traveled to the Palavela after hearing something had happened. Terrorism? Nope. Drug accusations? Guess again. Murder? Nice try Pinnochio.
When they got there, they couldn't believe their eyes. In front of them was a gargantuan Sasha Cohen, who was going through the growth spurt to end all growth spurts. And with her growth showing no signs of abating, her increasing size was threatening the very existence of the city of Torino.
The slogan of the Torino Olympics was "Passion Lives Here." Might as well call it now, "Giant Sasha Cohen Lives Here."
151111111.title: Giant Sasha Lives Here

choices: They manage to calm her down a bit
151111112.content: People were breaking out at the oversized figure skater finally it seemed her growth spurt stopped Sasha breathe a sigh of relief "Oh thank goodness!" she thought now there was a bigger problem how was she to compete when she was the size of Godzilla? she turned to the U.S officials and in the tiniest whisper she could manage without causing any more damage she asked "Umm can you contact my family back home so they will know.." "They already do Miss Cohen heck everyone does by now its all over the news!" "What?" Sasha shouted her loud voice causing massive tremors across the world itself quickly she covered her mouth with one hand and calmed herself "Sorry about that! Oh no now I'm going to be labeled a giant freak for the rest of my life and now..I..can't even..compete anymore.." unable to control her emotions or stop the floodgates Sasha began openly crying her massive tears causing even more damage if that was possible several of the people were breaking out even more "Oh God we got to do something! She's going to kill us all if she doesn't stop!"
151111112.title: Give It to Me

15111112.content:
"WHY ME,WHY TODAY?"Sasha boomed. just then she saw a crowd of tiny news vans coming her way."OH,CRUD."Sasha said.and then she starts to jumped over the speck and into the ocean and then her body began to tingle,her giant face fell into the water causeing a "little" tital wave.

when she awoke to find herself...
15111112.title: "WHY ME?"

151111121.content:
As she woke up, she realized she was twice as big as she was when she got there, and unfortunately for Sasha, she was STILL growing ever bigger. She had become so large she could be seen all the way from southern Sicily in southern Italy.
Now at 1500 feet tall and stillgrowing, Sasha thought of purposely thought of killing herself to make the pain of outgrowing everything go away. But she realized, "You know what, there are so many advances in technology today, I can be reduced to my normal size, and I can still participate in the Olympics just in time. And, I want to be with my family, as they mean much more than anything else."
She reached the Lazio region, home of Italy's capital Rome, which set off tremendous panic on the inland.
151111121.title: Large and in Charge

choices: Starts eating the fill  vendor stands nearby
151111122.content: The giant figure skating beauty stares in awe as she amazingly shrinks down a great deal all the way to 150 feet still larger than life but nonetheless satisfied "Oh thank God!" Sasha cried happily staring down at the people "Its alright now people I am..." but a sudden rumbling stops her halfway and the titanic sports star clutches her stomach "Ohhh so hungry!" she moans as her belly moans again enough to cause a 10 mile quake across the States Sasha then
151111122.title: shrinks a little,150ft.

info.brief_description: Female Olympians grow and run amok

This is about female Olympians who while competing in the Torino Olympic Games experience a "big" problem while going for gold.

Thank you for your time.
